Package mercs

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuyRound
    This represents the options available to the current player in a round of buying in a game of Mercs.
    Game
    Turn starts if buy and there are available PieceTypes, current player can get the available Tiles for a PieceType (needs Board), get the available PieceTypes (needs Board and playerToPieceToType), depends on PieceType maxes and available Tiles (if there's no available Tiles, the PieceType is unavailable) PieceType maxes are handled by player's PiecePlacer (yes, really).
    MoveRound
    This represents the options available to the current player in a round of movement in a game of Mercs.
    PiecePlacer
    Chooses a piece to place on a board based on its assigned PieceType.
    PieceTypeShop
    TODO: Document TODO: Extract interface
    PlayerBoardController  
    PlayMaker
    This class executes a play for a piece, with the given information of the different plays that each piece can make.
    RecordUpdater  
    TurnSequencer
    Decides a TurnState given a prior TurnState, the order of players, and the cooldowns for those players.
    TurnState
    TODO: Document and add exceptions.
    UpdatingPlayMaker
    TODO: Document
